01c8c00d585a67871c0d5d26063389a6344a585c.query:
SELECT id, name, description, icon_url
            FROM emotions
            WHERE id = $1

0be16ffec869c9e7af5512fc8bf794560b497b82.query:
INSERT INTO stories (id, title, medium_id, creator_id)
        VALUES (
                $1,
                $2,
                (
                    SELECT id
                    FROM mediums
                    WHERE name = 'Book'
                ),
                (
                    SELECT id
                    FROM creators
                    WHERE name = 'Anonymous'
                )
            ) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
        RETURNING id

0f5ea20e3ce0ffe2910777bf1ec7fc918bbebb5c.query:
UPDATE review_emotions
            SET emotion_id  = COALESCE($1, emotion_id),
                position    = COALESCE($2, position),
                notes       = COALESCE($3, notes)
            WHERE review_id = (SELECT id
                                 FROM users,
                                      reviews
                                WHERE slug           = $4
                                  AND users.user_id  = reviews.user_id
                                  AND users.username = $6
                                LIMIT 1
                               )
               AND position = $5
            RETURNING emotion_id,
                      position, 
                      notes

1a66539537c71a52ffacfe03719f39c0e6b174a6.query:
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users
        WHERE username = $1

2c46d9b3160ef9ad68700bb4c6aad60da9de1c00.query:
SELECT user_id, username 
        FROM users
        WHERE user_id = $1

2e2dc988cfeddc68cba7e8e27795268a6d674b79.query:
with story_mediums as (
            SELECT 
                stories.id as id,
                stories.title as title,
                mediums.name as medium,
                stories.creator_id as creator_id
            FROM stories
                JOIN mediums ON stories.medium_id = mediums.id
            )
        SELECT
            story_mediums.id as "id!",
            story_mediums.title as "title!",
            story_mediums.medium,
            creators.name as creator
        FROM story_mediums
            JOIN creators ON story_mediums.creator_id = creators.id

3f6b86bc5fd6cbbc74917a1e2475522f1d323a79.query:
SELECT id, name, description, icon_url
            FROM emotions

425bf365f676ef80b3b947e10dc2e5c035d36ee1.query:
INSERT INTO stories (id, title, medium_id, creator_id)
        VALUES (
                $1,
                $2,
                (
                    SELECT id
                    FROM mediums
                    WHERE name = $3
                    LIMIT 1
                ), $4
            )
        RETURNING id,
            title,
            (
                SELECT name
                FROM mediums
                WHERE id = medium_id
                LIMIT 1
            ) as medium,
            (
                SELECT name
                FROM creators
                WHERE id = creator_id
                LIMIT 1
            ) as creator

7ce6d78feae8cbc4700e0cbcf8dc4764f269a879.query:
INSERT INTO creators (id, name)
        VALUES ($1, $2) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
        RETURNING id

8219707831f28b7fb24d2dc85cdc894c2eb4e713.query:
INSERT INTO users (user_id, username, password_hash)
            VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
            RETURNING user_id, username

a9c64f70a0b65beade2022a32505ef6433f811c1.query:
DELETE 
              FROM  review_emotions re
             WHERE  EXISTS (
                SELECT 1
                  FROM reviews
                 WHERE reviews.id      = re.review_id
                   AND reviews.user_id = $1
             )

b380e0ae28aa31e8416c01f16e8d69cbb68ff659.query:
INSERT INTO review_emotions(
                id,
                review_id,
                emotion_id,
                position,
                notes
            )
            VALUES (
                $1,
                (
                    SELECT id
                      FROM users,
                           reviews
                     WHERE slug           = $3
                       AND users.user_id  = reviews.user_id
                       AND users.username = $2
                     LIMIT 1
                ), 
                $4, 
                $5,
                $6 
            )
            RETURNING emotion_id, position, notes

c0662261f685d73031942324e240c0ad9ad4cf44.query:
SELECT reviews.id as id,
            title,
            slug,
            body,
            created_at,
            updated_at,
            username
        FROM reviews,
            users,
            stories
        WHERE slug = $2
            AND users.user_id = reviews.user_id
            AND users.username = $1
            AND stories.id = reviews.story_id

c410ceada60020f7471e7247a8bcd27ffc3af878.query:
DELETE 
              FROM  review_emotions
             WHERE  review_id = (SELECT id
                                   FROM users,
                                        reviews
                                  WHERE slug           = $1
                                    AND users.user_id  = reviews.user_id
                                    AND users.username = $3
                                  LIMIT 1
                               )
                AND position = $2

c99d9e22fcc337ad063d3c6165b47ad0fcd61fb4.query:
SELECT user_id 
            FROM users
            WHERE user_id = $1

dc69af2964a1204af19b738dec7ea5ec52fa0613.query:
INSERT INTO reviews (
                id,
                story_id,
                slug,
                body,
                created_at,
                updated_at,
                user_id
            )
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7)
        RETURNING id,
            story_id,
            slug,
            body,
            created_at,
            updated_at,
            user_id

dd717cc9945066e5d4451259adc328efaa19211e.query:
INSERT INTO stories (id, title, medium_id, creator_id)
                VALUES (
                        $1,
                        $2,
                        (
                            SELECT id
                            FROM mediums
                            WHERE name = 'Book'
                        ),
                        (
                            SELECT id
                            FROM creators
                            WHERE name = 'Anonymous'
                        )
                    ) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
                RETURNING id, title

df4d947abbfb0cdc8f85075cb93f8dc63eb6ec6a.query:
UPDATE reviews
        SET story_id = COALESCE($1, story_id),
            slug = COALESCE($2, slug),
            body = COALESCE($3, body),
            updated_at = $4
        WHERE slug = $5
            AND reviews.user_id = (
                SELECT user_id
                FROM users
                WHERE username = $6
            )
        RETURNING id,
            (
                SELECT title
                FROM stories
                WHERE stories.id = story_id
            ) as title,
            story_id,
            slug,
            body,
            created_at,
            updated_at,
            user_id

e2300840ae7a05d77d482000d9727950b3c49454.query:
SELECT reviews.id as id,
            title,
            slug,
            body,
            created_at,
            updated_at,
            username
        FROM reviews,
            users,
            stories
        WHERE reviews.user_id = COALESCE($3, reviews.user_id)
            AND reviews.user_id = users.user_id
            AND stories.id = reviews.story_id
        ORDER BY updated_at DESC
        LIMIT $1 OFFSET $2

e424f34fcc9c80469eb9fbb3b067140079256b6c.query:
SELECT emotion_id,
                   position,
                   notes
              FROM users, 
                   reviews,
                   review_emotions,
                   emotions
            WHERE  users.user_id  = reviews.user_id
              AND  users.username = $1
              AND  reviews.slug   = $2
              AND  review_emotions.position = $3

e6d5647507c955bee700916f621707b4bab0563f.query:
SELECT emotion_id,
                   position,
                   notes
              FROM review_emotions
            WHERE  review_id = $1
          ORDER BY position ASC
